dieWater_0.TEXT_TEXT: When I eventually wake up I'm unbelievably hot. My lips are dry.

dieWater_1.TEXT_TEXT: I sit up, the effort sending my head into a tailspin that slams me back to the ground.

dieWater_3.TEXT_TEXT: I reach desparately for my bag. After several failed attempts I manage to loosely grab a string and pull it over.

dieWater_4.TEXT_TEXT:
My hand searches desperately for a bottle with weight. Empty... empty... empty...
I'm out of water.
